channel.title: 704 source changing character to female
channel.description: How would i get characters to change there look to female i have tried to code the make-ove mage but she only changes the skin color

item.title: 704 source changing character to female
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

Okay because i was bored i will fix it for you or show u how.
First go to src>com>rs>game>player open Appearence.java and look for this:

change it to this:

[code=java]public void female() {
	look[0] = 48; // Hair
	look[1] = 57; // Beard
	look[2] = 57; // Torso
	look[3] = 65; // Arms
	look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
	look[5] = 77; // Legs
	look[6] = 80; // Shoes

	colour[2] = 16;
	colour[1] = 16;
	colour[0] = 3;
	male = false;
}[/code]

save and exit.

now go to:
src>com>rs>game>player>content commands.java and add this:

		[code=java]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("female")) {
            player.getAppearence().female();
			}[/code]

save exit and comple your female will now look like this.

if u want to be a male again copy the femal command and change it to male hope this helped

Read full topic
